roleset.name: give honor to, having received honor

role.descr: the honor itself, thing that is an honor

example.name: honor-v: just transitive
example.text: Our plan is to honor Charles Schulz and the strip all year long . ''

example.name: honor-v: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: They will understand why you 're here being honored in Washington , D.C. as one of the top 54 teachers around our country .

propbank.arg: as one of the top 54 teachers around our country

example.name: honor-v: event as Arg0
example.text: The Vice President Dick Cheney is now speaking in Washington at a luncheon honoring the Secretary of Defense , Donald Rumsfeld .

example.name: in_honor-x: args 1,2
example.text: The rest agreed with him and immediately called the place Edgar in honor of him for suggesting the plan .

example.name: honor-n: with arg3
example.text: There are 21 Georgia recipients who share the honor of the highest award for heroism in military action that this nation can bestow on a member of its Armed Forces .

propbank.arg: of the highest award for heroism in military action that this nation can bestow on a member of its Armed Forces

example.name: honor-n: Rare arg0
example.text: I am glad that Frodo now realizes he does n't have to be some great and noble hero to belong with the Elves , or to accept their honor of him .

example.name: honored-j: arg1
example.text: Hahaha ! awesome ! Thanks ! ! ! I feel pretty honored .

roleset.note: HONOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'honor' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from honor.01-v predicate notes)
HONOR-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on honor-v.01, WN sense #2. Corresponds to VNcls judgement-33. (from honor.01-n)
HONORED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from honored.01-j)

roleset.name: to uphold a promise, law or regulation, law, regulation

example.name: honor-v: just transitive
example.text: Israel is to withdraw its forces from several areas over the next two days , and an Israeli official says his country would honor the cease - fire even if sporadic rock - throwing continues .

propbank.arg: even if sporadic rock - throwing continues

example.name: honor-n: arg1
example.text: All rise is a way of showing honor not so much to the individual judge , though I believe that is proper , but to show honor for the law in general .

roleset.note: HONOR-V NOTES: Roleset added by Miriam. (from honor.02-v)
HONOR-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on honor-v.02. No VNcls. (from honor.02-n)

roleset.name: deserving of honor, respect

example.name: honorable-j
example.text: If Brutus was honorable he would n't have been so easily persuaded by Cassius to go as far as committing a murder .

roleset.note: HONORABLE-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to honor-v etc (from honorable.01-j)
